entry.title: Yearly renewals
entry.content: Be careful to check that you are not signed up to annual renwewals as Fotor do not advise you that these are due for payment and will not refund even if its clear that you have never used the service. Customer Service very unhelpful in trying to resolve issue

Yearly renewals

Be careful to check that you are not signed up to annual renwewals as Fotor do not advise you that these are due for payment and will not refund even if its clear that you have never used the service. Customer Service very unhelpful in trying to resolve issue

entry.title: Superb
entry.content: Great and easy to use app for enhancing even the most unpromising photo, don't delete until you've tried Fotor! :)

Superb

entry.title: Awful collage templates, ok photo editor
entry.content: The templates in the collage maker are horrendous. The words are nonsense and it's not customisable at all. Not even the awful text. Lots of unwanted advertising. Can't use a single magazine template.

Awful collage templates, ok photo editor

The templates in the collage maker are horrendous. The words are nonsense and it's not customisable at all. Not even the awful text. Lots of unwanted advertising. Can't use a single magazine template.

entry.content: Just installed the app and it's amazing!! It's even free ?!! :))

Amazing

entry.title: Excellent!
entry.content: Highly recommended! Beats Lightroom hands down!

Excellent!

Highly recommended! Beats Lightroom hands down!

entry.title: Brilliant Job. 100 images resized in 2 mins
entry.content:
Ideal if you need to bulk crop images. This is what I have used it for currently but hope to try out the other features soon.
I am a website desveloper and create websites that need a lot of images taken from 4mb+ to around 100kb or 600px - 1200px widths. As quick as you can spell Foto Photo Editor the job is complete!
Great wee item I reckon a lot of web developers need this in their locker. I am amazed it is free!
Good work guys!

Brilliant Job. 100 images resized in 2 mins

Ideal if you need to bulk crop images. This is what I have used it for currently but hope to try out the other features soon.

I am a website desveloper and create websites that need a lot of images taken from 4mb+ to around 100kb or 600px - 1200px widths. As quick as you can spell Foto Photo Editor the job is complete!

Great wee item I reckon a lot of web developers need this in their locker. I am amazed it is free!

Good work guys!

entry.title: Brilliant photo app
entry.content: Best photo pocket editing app ever. I'm a photographer who takes photos daily, this app is so handy when comes down to tweaking my photos there and then on the spot rather than me waiting to get back home to use Photoshop. Highly recommend it to everyone

entry.title: Epic Fotor
entry.content: The app is amazing! I use it alongside 'Go Art' which happens to be the same developer but I found it individually. I only wish collage frames could be adjusted individually for each picture - extended or shrunken. Overall, this app got me into photo editing ‚ò∫üëåüèΩAll the best.

Epic Fotor

The app is amazing! I use it alongside 'Go Art' which happens to be the same developer but I found it individually. I only wish collage frames could be adjusted individually for each picture - extended or shrunken. Overall, this app got me into photo editing ‚ò∫üëåüèΩAll the best.

entry.title: Awesome
entry.content: Love it! I use it every day!

Awesome

Love it! I use it every day!

entry.title: What was my go-to collage app, just got hit for six.
entry.content:
Quite a good app for one thing.
This was by far the best of a very bad bunch for making collages (it's other functions don't impress). It works well but you always have to wade through the grindingly useless in-app design offerings to arrive at the classic collages but ‚Äî they are great when you eventually find them.
Simple, lots of options and it is reliable. You can output to iCloud Photo-stream directly. The biggest annoyance is that it doesn't remember I don't want cack-ware and doesn't default to the classic (free) collage designs.
Unfortunately for Fotor‚Ä¶ Adobe's new collage functionality in Photoshop Express just made this app pretty much redundant. It now seem slow cumbersome and fussy. Unless it catches up to be as slick as PS Express this app won't stay on my iDevices for long.‚Ä¶
A couple of weeks later. Goodbye Fotor.

What was my go-to collage app, just got hit for six.

Quite a good app for one thing.

This was by far the best of a very bad bunch for making collages (it's other functions don't impress). It works well but you always have to wade through the grindingly useless in-app design offerings to arrive at the classic collages but ‚Äî they are great when you eventually find them.

Simple, lots of options and it is reliable. You can output to iCloud Photo-stream directly. The biggest annoyance is that it doesn't remember I don't want cack-ware and doesn't default to the classic (free) collage designs.

Unfortunately for Fotor‚Ä¶ Adobe's new collage functionality in Photoshop Express just made this app pretty much redundant. It now seem slow cumbersome and fussy. Unless it catches up to be as slick as PS Express this app won't stay on my iDevices for long.‚Ä¶

A couple of weeks later. Goodbye Fotor.

entry.title: Perfect and Intuitive
entry.content: With no experience, I found the app easily understood, intuitive, and with good tutorials - not too much but enough to get me through. I recommend for the person who is unsure of their ability to handle new apps.

Perfect and Intuitive

With no experience, I found the app easily understood, intuitive, and with good tutorials - not too much but enough to get me through. I recommend for the person who is unsure of their ability to handle new apps.

entry.title: Events üò°
entry.content: Good app. Nice for editing. But you need a critical review once in a while. You have to PAY for events?! And 50-100 dollars is too much! It's just entering a photo and seeing if you win? Can you at least lower the price. Otherwise it's a good app with a pretty good editor.

entry.title: Taken away editing tools
entry.content: I used to be able to edit photos- blur/erase out certain text or images. They've taken that tool away. Editing tools are useless now. Deleting - bye!

Taken away editing tools

I used to be able to edit photos- blur/erase out certain text or images. They've taken that tool away. Editing tools are useless now. Deleting - bye!

entry.title: Splendid photo app!
entry.content: I really like this photo app. It's easy to navigate and gives you simple and quick demo's on how to use the effects and features. I used it on my wedding group photo to zoom in on a picture of my Aunt and was able to adjust it to look like a separate individual photo. It turned out so well that I printed it and it was on show at her funeral service. Thank you so much Fotor.

Splendid photo app!

I really like this photo app. It's easy to navigate and gives you simple and quick demo's on how to use the effects and features. I used it on my wedding group photo to zoom in on a picture of my Aunt and was able to adjust it to look like a separate individual photo. It turned out so well that I printed it and it was on show at her funeral service. Thank you so much Fotor.

entry.title: Collage
entry.content: I liked this app as it was fairly easy to use, and now they've introduced these unnecessary things and I can't make a basic collage without it looking like a newspaper article.

Collage

I liked this app as it was fairly easy to use, and now they've introduced these unnecessary things and I can't make a basic collage without it looking like a newspaper article.

entry.title: Why????!!!!!?????
entry.content:
This WAS fantastic, but now it appears, I cannot access my general photos folder through the app to edit them, only photos taken in or previously edited in, the app it's self. Am I missing something here? I tried to go to app support to query this, but it just took me to an ad for the app.
Revert back to before the last update pleeeeeeeaaaase!!!

Why????!!!!!?????

This WAS fantastic, but now it appears, I cannot access my general photos folder through the app to edit them, only photos taken in or previously edited in, the app it's self. Am I missing something here?
I tried to go to app support to query this, but it just took me to an ad for the app.

Revert back to before the last update pleeeeeeeaaaase!!!

entry.title: Major Problems
entry.content: I have been using this APP for four years, it WAS brilliant but appears to now have some major problems, not saving photos (rather essential!) etc, PLEASE correct ASAP.

Major Problems
